title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/Classic $80 off, Galaxy Buds 2 hits $110, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 models from $210. That’s alongside Samsung’s latest Galaxy Buds 2 at $110 and JBL’s Bluetooth speakers starting from $30. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/Classic $80 off, Galaxy Buds 2 hits $110, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A notable Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic has arrived at $80 off, alongside other models from $210. That's alongside Galaxy Buds 2 and more.
